sentences.en: Beethoven at first dedicated his Heroes Symphony to Napoleon.
sentences.cn: 最初贝多芬把他的《英雄》交响曲献给了拿破仑.

sentences.en: Beethoven's Ninth Symphony is a glorious piece of music.
sentences.cn: 贝多芬的第九交响曲是壮丽的音乐篇章.
布鲁克纳的《第五交响曲》

sentences.en: He is a protean stylist who can move from blues to ballads and grand symphony.
sentences.cn: 他风格多变，从布鲁斯、乡村音乐到雄壮的交响乐都能驾驭。

sentences.en: In this performance, Rattle had the acoustic of the Symphony Hall on his side.
sentences.cn: 这场演出中，拉特尔有交响乐大厅出色的音响效果做他的后盾。

sentences.en: It is not possible to reconstruct the complete symphony from these manuscript sketches.
sentences.cn: 想要通过这些手写草稿恢复这一交响乐的全貌是不可能的.
交响乐乐师未必就能视奏。

sentences.en: The BBC Symphony Orchestra played with great panache.
sentences.cn: 英国广播公司交响乐团演奏起来挥洒自如。

sentences.en: The Lithuanian Philharmonic Orchestra played Beethoven's Ninth Symphony.
sentences.cn: 立陶宛爱乐交响乐团演奏了贝多芬的《第九交响曲》。

sentences.en: The Ninth Symphony of Beethoven is a famous one.
sentences.cn: 贝多芬的第九交响乐非常有名.

sentences.en: the rousing finale of Beethoven's Ninth Symphony
sentences.cn: 贝多芬第九交响曲激动人心的末乐章

sentences.en: The strings are muted throughout the closing bars of the symphony.
sentences.cn: 该交响曲结束部分各节中的弦乐全为弱化音.

sentences.en: The symphony does require a largish group of players.
sentences.cn: 这首交响曲确实需要为数不少的一组演奏者。

sentences.en: There's wonderfully lyrical flute solo in the middle of this symphony.
sentences.cn: 在交响乐中间有一段奇妙的抒情长笛独奏.

sentences.en: They play over the whole symphony.
sentences.cn: 他们把整个交响乐重新演奏了一遍.

words.tran_cn: 交响乐的；交响性的；和声的

trans.tran_cn: 交响乐，交响曲，序曲，插曲，〈古〉和谐，和谐的东西
trans.tran_en: a long piece of music usually in four parts, written for an  orchestra
